text: Ola Svensson (born 6 April 1964) is a retired Swedish football defender.Weltfussball He was a squad member at the 1988 Olympics without playing a match. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish footballers Category:Halmstads BK players Category:IFK Göteborg players Category:Association football defenders Category:Allsvenskan players Category:Sweden under-21 international footballers
title: Ola Svensson (footballer, born 1964)
